description: The SQL*Net inspection engine in Cisco ASA Software 7.2 before 7.2(5.13), 8.2 before 8.2(5.50), 8.3 before 8.3(2.42), 8.4 before 8.4(7.15), 8.5 before 8.5(1.21), 8.6 before 8.6(1.14), 8.7 before 8.7(1.13), 9.0 before 9.0(4.5), and 9.1 before 9.1(5.1) allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (device reload) via crafted SQL REDIRECT packets, aka Bug ID CSCum46027.
